topic.title: GIF Time updater
topic.body:
I'm trying to set up a GIF Time clone and the updater always shows `Error downloading video: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'temp/last.gif', skipping`.

What should I do?

1_1P9ifvMbVtQQzqRQmhKnRzJMm7Cgb2fTgw.body:
Do you mean porn?

There are some. Most notably [0chan Porn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc).

Take a look at the [wiki](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:zite-list-porn) too.
